728622f-a.text:
Broad Street, north side, east from its junction with Canal
Street.
January 13, 1931.
P. L. Sperr.
728622f-a.folder: Broad Street & Canal Street, Staten Island, NY

728636f-a.text:
160 Canal Street (frame house), east side, between Broad and Wright Streets (Stapleton). The Robinson maps of 1907 and 1898
show it to have been the Hein home.
July s, 1932.
P. L. Sperr.
728636f-a.folder: Canal Street & Broad Street, Staten Island, NY

728637f-a.text:
172 to 180 (left to right) Canal Street, east side, north of Broad Street (Stapleton). No. 176, the 2-story brick building, is
the Baker Business School.
July s, 1932.
P. L. Sperr.
728637f-a.folder: Canal Street & Broad Street, Staten Island, NY

728639f-a.text:
Canal Street, north side, east from (No. 209) but not including Broad Street (Stapleton). The clock-tower building, in the background, is the Rubsam and Horrmann Atlantic Brewery (1917 map).
October 4, 1936.
P. L. Sperr.
728639f-a.folder: Canal Street & Broad Street, Staten Island, NY

728640f-a.text:
223 to 209 (left to right). Canal Street, west side, north of
Broad Street (Stapleton).
October 4, 1936.
P. L. Sperr.
728640f-a.folder: Canal Street & Broad Street, Staten Island, NY
